QuestData.Title: Mor'shan Caravan Delivery
QuestData.Description: You've managed to stir the Burning Blade's nest. Our scouts report that they are gathering for an attack.$B$BYou must complete the caravan's journey before they arrive. The supplies are packed, the kodos are rested, and I hope you don't mind but I made a few adjustments to your gun.$B$BIf you meet up with any resistance, shoot first and ask questions later.$B$BQuickly! They come! Speak to me when you are ready to leave.
QuestData.RewardText: Some days we gain quarter, other days we are beaten back behind our walls. Every day, we bury more of our brothers and sisters.$B$B<Kadrak pauses and takes a deep breath.>$B$BNot only have the supplies you brought strengthened our troops, but your heroic deeds have inspired them as well. Thank you, $c.
